description: A critical alarm has occurred.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD PANDUIT-MIB::trapCritical PANDUIT-MIB::trapCode i 761 PANDUIT-MIB::trapDescription s 'Smart\ Rack\ Access\ Door\ Opened' RFC1213-MIB::sysDescr s EXAMPLE PANDUIT-MIB::pdug5IPv4Address a 192.0.2.1

description: A number identifying the event for the trap that was sent.
variables.name: PANDUIT-MIB::trapCode

description: A string identifying the event for that last trap that was sent.
variables.name: PANDUIT-MIB::trapDescription

description: A textual description of the entity. This value should
include the full name and version identification of
the system's hardware type, software operating-system
and networking software.
variables.name: RFC1213-MIB::sysDescr

description: The current IPv4 Address.
A value of 0.0.0.0 indicates an error or an unset option.
variables.name: PANDUIT-MIB::pdug5IPv4Address
